content.new: When compiling a client program against Gazebo's libraries, I have to explicitly link against some Boost libraries, even though my code doesn't call Boost.  This is also done in the [listener example](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b2d2cf062c2b091
content.old: When compiling a client program against Gazebo's libraries, I have to explicitly link against some Boost libraries, even though my code doesn't call Boost.  This is also done in the [listener example](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b2d2cf062c2b091

title.new: Gazebo's installed CMake configuration should export Boost and Protobuf libs
title.old: Gazebo's installed CMake configuration should export Boost libs

issue.title: Gazebo's installed CMake configuration should export Boost and Protobuf libs
